statements: SELECT id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT name FROM patients WHERE age < 18
SELECT id, name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 40
SELECT id, date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 201
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31'
SELECT date, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 102 AND date > '2022-11-01'
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id
SELECT p.name, a.date FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, a.date AS appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, a.date AS appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id WHERE a.date > '2022-12-01'
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, a.date AS appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id ORDER BY a.date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM Appointments;
